question: Performing salatul jumuah - If someone works 45 minutes drive from the city, and there is no masjid close to his workplace.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalaamu alaikum Mufti Sahib If someone works 45 minutes drive from the city, and there is no masjid close to his workplace. Will he have to perform salat-ul-jumuah or does he pray dhuhr. In order to drive to the masjid and perform salatul jumuah there it would take of 2 hours, the boss will not allow it. jazakAllah
ANSWER


Share:
He will perform Dhuhr salat only.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
